description:
In this final episode, Kid goes up against the enigmatic Corbeau one more time as they vie for the jewel that may contain Pandora, which means Snake can`t be far behind!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Midnight Crow (Kouhen) Gekitotsu! Shiro ka Kuro ka!?
Midnight Crow (Part Two): Clash! White or Black?!
Midnight Crow, suite et fin : Le choc ! Blanc ou noir ?
真夜中の鳥[ミッドナイト・クロウ](後編)激突! 白か黒か!?
